nodes.short_description: THRASHER is a mind-melting arcade odyssey and audiovisual experience.  With the wave of your hand (or controller), guide a magnificent space eel through mesmerizing alien worlds.  Swoop, dash, and thrash to defeat wild bosses in the ultimate race for survival.  Dig into the game's deep combo system to top the leaderboards, or simply vibe out inside the breathtaking but unsettling landscapes.

THRASHER est à la fois une odyssée arcade-action totalement barrée et une expérience audiovisuelle viscérale. D’un geste de la main, guidez une magnifique anguille spatiale à travers des paysages aussi sublimes que perturbants. Tournoyez, chargez et fracassez vos ennemis avant de venir à bout de boss redoutables dans cette incroyable course à la survie !

THRASHER — захватывающая аркадная экшн-одиссея и яркий аудиовизуальный опыт. Взмахом руки управляйте космическим угрем среди фантастических пейзажей. Прыгайте, петляйте и бейте, чтобы победить боссов в дикой гонке на выживание.

THRASHER ist eine atemberaubende Arcade-Action-Odyssee und ein tiefgehendes, audiovisuelles Erlebnis. Mit nur einer Handbewegung steuerst du einen prächtigen Weltraumaal durch atemberaubende und beunruhigende Landschaften. Wische, rase und stoße, um wilde Bosse im ultimativen Rennen ums Überleben zu besiegen.

THRASHER è un gioco d'azione arcade sconvolgente e un'esperienza audiovisiva viscerale. Con il semplice gesto della tua mano guiderai una spettacolare anguilla spaziale attraverso paesaggi mozzafiato e inquietanti. Accelera, scatta e colpisci per sconfiggere boss fortissimi in questa lotta per la sopravvivenza.
『THRASHER』がもたらすもの、それは刺激的感覚のアーケードアクションオデッセイ、そして心の奥底で感じるオーディオビジュアル体験。あなたがその手を振るだけで、見る者たちを圧倒する宇宙ウナギが息を飲むほどの緊迫のステージを自由自在に動き回る。突撃、疾走、縦横無尽の動きを駆使して、究極の生存競争の真っ只中で未知なるボス達を打ち破れ。
THRASHER는 정신이 녹을 듯한 아케이드 액션 어드벤처이자 본능적인 시청각적 체험입니다. 손을 흔들어서 화려한 우주 뱀장어를 불안하면서도 가슴 뛰게 만드는 풍경으로 안내하십시오. 그리고 생존을 위해 궁극의 종족으로 이루어진 야생 보스들을 급습하고, 달려들고, 강타하여 무찌르십시오.

THRASHER combina una odisea de acción arcade con una experiencia audiovisual visceral.  Guiarás a una anguila espacial con el movimiento de tus manos a través de paisajes imponentes.  Lánzate, embiste y arremete para derrotar a jefes salvajes en esta carrera por la supervivencia.
是一款迷乱梦幻的街机类动作游戏，将让你踏上玄妙的旅途，获得难以言表的视听体验。你将挥手指引太空巨鳗穿过令人惊叹而又胆寒的地方，俯冲、突进、猛抽，在终极的生存之战中战胜不可思议的头目。

nodes.long_description:
From the artist & composer behind the cult hit THUMPER comes THRASHER, a mind-melting cosmic racer and essential audiovisual experience. Use fast paced gestural controls to evolve your space eel from worm to megabeast in a breakneck race for survival that begins at the dawn of time.

Immerse yourself in a dazzling adventure across space, where music, visuals and gameplay mesh into one transcendent experience.

Use elegant gestural controls to swoop, dash and thrash across the void at breakneck speed, busting through obstacles and stacking up combos as you battle towards the next boss.

Lose yourself in the thumping soundtrack created by designer Brian Gibson, bassist for the band Lightning Bolt. Thrasher is a 3D audio showcase, combining spatial audio and haptics to create a stunning sensory experience.

Vibe out and enjoy the crazy journey, or push yourself to the limit by chaining together huge combos to worm your way up the rankings.
nodes.short_description: THRASHER is a mind-melting cosmic racer.  Swoop, dash, and thrash to defeat wild bosses in the ultimate race for survival.

nodes.change_log: quick wave restart feature, level 1-1 added hazards, fixed bugs with text hud centering, and more
update 4: 90hz on quest 3/3s, overhauled haptics with Haptics Studio, volume control, quick restart
support for MX Ink stylus, localization overhaul, minor bug fixes

First update after store release

Improvements:
* Performance optimizations
* Rank achieved now shown on leaderboards in addition to time
* Improved musical timing of wave transition
* Additional polish to the game end sequence
* Improved collision between space eel and "ladder" crystals when dashing
* Space eel dynamically steers out of the way of the player's head when diving into new wave or flying towards player
* Space eel dives into wave from one of 4 different corners based on aim direction

Bug Fixes:
* Fix issue where music doesn't always loop properly
* Fix for red "1:00" that would show after your space eel dies
* Fix for haptics not working when crashing through things with the Thrash Attack powerup
* Fixed space eel head being oriented incorrectly when flying towards the player 
* Fix for some gameplay assets drawing on top of the pause menu
* When you dash into a spike ball, "ladder" crystals past the impact point no longer shatter
same as rc3 but with cheats removed
